properties.name: Freiburg Galaxy Server
properties.Training: We offer twice a year a one week hands-on training course.

properties.name: MPI-IE Galaxy Server
properties.description: The Home of deepTools - test and play around with the latest deepTools version.

properties.name: FMI Galaxy Server
properties.description: Galaxy server at the Friedrich Miescher Institute for Biomedical Research - On top of the general Galaxy tools, we offer NGS and microarray analysis using custom made scripts for all wet lab researchers at the FMI.

properties.name: MDC Galaxy Server
properties.description: We offer twice a year a hands-on training course.

properties.name: Erasmus MC Galaxy Server
properties.description: Galaxy server at Erasmus Medical Center in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. This server offers tools for NGS analysis, RNA-Seq and Metagenomics/Microbiomics

properties.name: CPT Galaxy Server
properties.description: Center for Phage Technology Server, offering tools for (Phage) NGS, Assembly, Analysis, and Annotation.

properties.name: oqtans Galaxy Server
properties.description: Customized version of the Galaxy framework provided by R{"a}tsch Laboratory, extended with machine learning based tools for sequencing data analysis and eukaryotic gene finding.
